general_info.summary: This document outlines various programs, schools, and initiatives at Sharda University for the 2025-26 academic year, encompassing dental sciences, medical sciences, nursing, examinations, academic credits, curriculum feedback, and university publications. It also details university aspects like leadership, history, statutory bodies, tenders, and legal documents, alongside student support services such as counseling, skill enhancement, language development, and entrepreneurship. The list further includes specific programs like FM radio, observerships, a mentoring portal, international campuses in Uzbekistan and Agra, courses on ethics, a cyber crime reporting portal, and international credit transfer.
